title: Design for living
brief_description: Looks at the considerations involved in designing homes for different locations and the problems faced in ensuring their suitability for particular functions. Factors include lightweight but strong construction, soundproofing, air conditioning, lighting and specialised construction procedures. Compromises are made to satisfy particular requirements.
